coverage_details.outpatient_deductible_hospitals: Nil (Except 20% up to SR 300 only for Suleiman Al-Habib hospital in Al-Riyadh)
coverage_details.vaccination: Covered up to Annual Limit (as per MOH schedule)
coverage_details.optical_frame: Frame Limit--SR400.00 (as part of optical limit)
coverage_details.organ_transplant: SR 250,000.00 (kidney only; other organs - not specified)
coverage_details.optical: SR 500.00 (age limit 0-14), all optical lens types covered for all schemes
coverage_details.approval_preauthorization_notes: No pre-authorisation required for VIP members for outpatient & inpatient services except: Outpatient services with limits, dental services, hearing aids, maternity, dialysis and optical require pre-authorisation. Medication preauth limit: SR 1,000,000.00. Medication limit is equal to pre-authorisation approval limit.
coverage_details.special_instructions: All optical lens specs are covered for all schemes. Optical covered only for ages up to 14 years. VIP deductible, 20% up to SR 300 only applies at Suleiman Al-Habib hospital in Al-Riyadh. Branded and generic medication deductibles are Nil. Medication limit equals pre-authorization approval limit.
